sentences: Steve Dansiger is an American drummer and member of the first two incarnations of avant-garde band King Missile and of the band Pianosaurus.
Dansiger is now a therapist and author with a Doctorate in Clinical Psychology.
Dansiger has appeared on comedian Marc Maron's WTF podcasts multiple times.
Clinical Dharma - A Path for Healers and Helpers.
• Dansiger, S, Marich J (2017) EMDR Therapy and Mindfulness for Trauma-Focused Care.
• Dansiger, S, (2019) Mindfulness for Anger Management.
